footer.tagline: Digital solutions without limits. Connecting creativity and technology.

about.heroDescription: Between ETF lectures and midnight coding sessions, we found something that drives us — the fusion of technology and understanding people.

chapter1.title: ETF Belgrade
chapter1.description: The Faculty of Electrical Engineering taught us to think systematically. Algorithms, data structures, software engineering — the foundations on which we build everything we do. But the university also taught us something else: that the best solutions emerge when theory meets the real world.
chapter1.label: Software engineering

chapter2.title: Understanding people
chapter2.description: Alongside our studies, we dove into the world of public opinion research and focus groups. We learned to listen, to ask the right questions, to understand what people really want — not what they say they want. This skill proved invaluable in product design and marketing.
chapter2.label: Market research

chapter3.title: Iskon Lab
chapter3.description: This is how Iskon Lab was born — a laboratory where code and empathy merge, algorithms and intuition, technology and understanding of people. The name "Iskon" means beginning, source — and that's exactly what we want to be for your projects.

values.title: What
values.description: Three principles that guide us in every project

excellence.title: Technical excellence
excellence.description: Software engineering isn't just a job — it's a way of thinking. Every problem has an elegant solution.

market.title: Market understanding
market.description: Code without context is just text. We understand people, trends, and what drives decisions.

creativity.title: Creative courage
creativity.description: We're students — we have nothing to lose. That gives us the freedom to be different.

statement.description: We listen, research, understand — and only then create solutions that truly work.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Your idea deserves a team that will understand and realize it.

servicesPage.heroDescription: We combine technical expertise with market understanding to create digital solutions that deliver results.
servicesPage.eachService: Each service is a story of its own

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.subtitle: From idea to production
webDevelopment.description: We build modern, fast, and scalable web applications that make an impression.
webDevelopment.longDescription: We start every web project with a deep understanding of your goals and user needs. We use the latest technologies and best practices to create solutions that are not only visually impressive but also technically superior.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApps.subtitle: In your users' pocket
mobileApps.description: Native and cross-platform applications that users love to use.
mobileApps.longDescription: Mobile applications are often the first contact users have with your brand today. That's why we create applications that are intuitive, fast, and pleasant to use — applications that users recommend to friends.

digitalMarketing.title: Digital Marketing
digitalMarketing.subtitle: Strategies that deliver results
digitalMarketing.description: Data-driven marketing that converts visitors into customers.
digitalMarketing.longDescription: Marketing without data is guesswork. We combine analytical thinking with creativity to create campaigns that actually work. Every decision is backed by data, every result is measurable.

branding.title: Branding
branding.subtitle: Identity that's remembered
branding.description: Visual identity that builds trust and recognition.
branding.longDescription: A brand is more than a logo — it's the entire experience users have with your company. We create coherent visual identities that communicate your values and leave a lasting impression.

ourProcess.title: Our
ourProcess.description: Transparent and efficient approach to every project

step1.title: Conversation
step1.description: We listen to your vision and define project goals.

step2.title: Strategy
step2.description: We create a detailed plan and choose the right technologies.

step3.title: Creation
step3.description: We design and develop with constant communication.

step4.title: Launch
step4.description: We test, optimize, and push to production.

step5.title: Support
step5.description: We stay with you even after project completion.

understand.title: We understand you
understand.description: We understand your needs and market needs and create what you need.

excellence.title: Technical excellence
excellence.description: Practical experience in large projects guarantees quality and performance.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: You know exactly what's happening at every moment. No surprises.

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.description: Your success is our success. We work until you're completely satisfied.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.description: Let's talk about your project. Free consultation, no obligations.
